dcterms:creator: Karl Moritz Hermann
Tomas Kocisky
Edward Grefenstette
Lasse Espeholt
Will Kay
Mustafa Suleyman
Phil Blunsom
dcterms:description: News stories from CNN and Daily Mail were used to evaluate the proposed approaches, where a query was generated by replacing an entity in the summary with a placeholder, and entities were anonymized to erase the world knowledge and co-occurrence effect for reading comprehension.
dcterms:title: News stories from CNN and Daily Mail

dcterms:creator: Takeshi Onishi
Hai Wang
Mohit Bansal
Kevin Gimpel
David McAllester
dcterms:description: Who Did What 2 (WD-W) is a large-scale person-centered cloze dataset constructed from the LD-C English Gigaword newswire corpus, where document pairs are chosen based on shared entities, and one article is selected as the document, while another article forms a cloze-style query.
dcterms:title: Who Did What 2 (WD-W)
